properties.body:
SOUTHERN NORTH SEA.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHALLENGER AND M/V SRV VANTAGE
   TOWING SIX 0.5 MILE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   53-22.3N 004-11.2E, 53-13.2N 004-10.5E,
   53-01.5N 003-45.0E, 53-12.6N 003-44.6E,
   53-12.6N 003-52.2E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1879/12(43) AND 2278/12(43).
